titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of the USS New Jersey and all those who served aboard her.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/22/2004--Introduced. Calls on the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend to the Postmaster General that a commemorative stamp be issued by the United States Postal Service honoring the USS New Jersey and all those who served aboard her.
